Title: ‘No new liquor shops; can shift the existing ones’
Content: Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Wednesday announced that no new liquor shops would come up in Delhi for the remainder of 2016 and mohalla sabhas will from now on be empowered to recommend the shutti
Author: Staff Reporter
Description: Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Wednesday announced that no new liquor shops would come up in Delhi for the remainder of 2016 and mohalla sabhas will from now on be empowered to recommend the shutti
